Generated Narrative: NamingSystem SEVCO

Summary

Defining URLhttp://terminology.hl7.org/NamingSystem/SEVCO
Version1.0.0
NameSEVCO
TitleScientific Evidence Code System (SEVCO)
Statusactive
Definition

The Scientific Evidence Code System (SEVCO) includes terms for describing scientific research, including study design, risk of bias, and statistical concepts. For additional derivation details for any term, see https://fevir.net/resources/CodeSystem/27270

For more information, see https://fevir.net/sevco

PublisherComputable Publishing LLC

Identifiers

TypeValuePreferredPeriodComment
URIhttps://fevir.net/sevcotrue2025-02-24 --> (ongoing)This is the URL as specified by the terminology owner, and is considered authoritative.
